Class Timetable.Lesson

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedream.untis4j.responseObjects.baseObjects.BaseResponseObjects.ResponseObject

    Timetable

    public static class Timetable.Lesson
extends BaseResponseObjects.ResponseObject
    Class to get information about a lesson

    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lesson

        public Lesson(java.time.LocalDate date,
              java.time.LocalTime startTime,
              java.time.LocalTime endTime,
              java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> klassenIds,
              java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> teacherId,
              java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> roomIds,
              java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> subjectIds,
              UntisUtils.LessonCode code,
              java.lang.String activityType)
        Initialize the Timetable.Lesson class
        Parameters:
        date - date of the timetable
        startTime - time when the lesson start
        endTime - time when the lesson end
        klassenIds - ids of the classes
        teacherId - ids of the teachers
        roomIds - ids of the rooms
        subjectIds - ids of the subjects
        code - code of the lesson (normally null, UntisUtils.LessonCode#CANCELLED if the lesson is cancelled, UntisUtils.LessonCode.IRREGULAR if e.g. a lesson has been moved
        activityType - type of the lesson
        Since:
        1.0
